de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Interface IGuiModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiModel

    public interface IGuiModel
extends IModel
    Sub type of IModel for GUI models (with all graphical information from an IDataModel or drawn by the user).
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • getElements

        java.util.List<IGuiElement> getElements()
        Returns a list with all IGuiElement in this IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        all IGuiElement as Java List

      • getSelectedElements

        java.util.List<IGuiElement> getSelectedElements()
        Returns a list with all selected IGuiElement in this IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        all selected IGuiElement as Java List

      • getElementById

        IGuiElement getElementById(java.lang.String id)
                    throws PNNoSuchElementException
        Returns the IGuiElement with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for
        Returns:
        The IGuiElement if found
        Throws:
        PNNoSuchElementException - If this model has no element with the specified id

      • getMinZValue

        int getMinZValue()
        Returns the minimum Z value (height level) over all elements in this IGuiModel.

        Note: Intended to be used for putting an element to the background.
        Returns:
        The minimum Z value

      • getMaxZValue

        int getMaxZValue()
        Returns the maximum Z value (height level) over all elements in this IGuiModel.

        Note: Intended to be used for putting an element to the foreground.
        Returns:
        The maximum Z value

      • getZValue

        int getZValue(IGuiElement element)
        Returns the Z value (height level) of the specified IGuiElement.
        Parameters:
        element - The specified IGuiElement
        Returns:
        The Z value

      • getDecrMinZ

        int getDecrMinZ()
        Returns a new minimum for the Z value (height level) for all IGuiElement in this IGuiModel. (the lowest level used by existing elements - 1)

        Note: The limit of MinInt should never be reachable during a session.
        Returns:
        The new minimum Z value; the current minimum if there are no elements

      • getIncrMaxZ

        int getIncrMaxZ()
        Returns a new maximum for the Z value (height level) for all IGuiElement in this IGuiModel. (the highest level used by existing elements + 1)

        Note: The limit of MaxInt should never be reachable during a session.
        Returns:
        The new maximum Z value; the current maximum if there are no elements

      • sortElements

        void sortElements()
        Sorts the List of elements with ascending z values (Height level).

      • sortSelectedElements

        void sortSelectedElements()
        Sorts the List of selected elements with ascending z values (Height level).

      • selectSingleElement

        void selectSingleElement(IGuiElement element)
        Sets the selected state of only the (one) specified IGuiElement and removes this state from all other IGuiElement in this IGuiModel.

        Note that the previous selection gets cleared if element is null.
        Parameters:
        element - The specified IGuiElement to select.

      • toggleSelection

        void toggleSelection(IGuiElement element)
        Toggles the selected state of the specified IGuiElement.
        Parameters:
        element - The specified IGuiElement

      • addToSelection

        void addToSelection(IGuiElement element)
        Adds the specified IGuiElement to the List of selected elements.
        Parameters:
        element - The IGuiElement to add

      • clearSelection

        void clearSelection()
        Clears the whole selection.

      • setGuiStartPlace

        void setGuiStartPlace(java.lang.String placeId,
                      boolean b)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the start place on the draw panel.
        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the DataPlace
        b - True to set as start place; otherwise false

      • setGuiStartPlaceCandidate

        void setGuiStartPlaceCandidate(java.lang.String placeId,
                               boolean b)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the start place candidate on the draw panel.
        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the DataPlace
        b - True to set as start place candidate; otherwise false

      • setGuiEndPlace

        void setGuiEndPlace(java.lang.String placeId,
                    boolean b)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the end place on the draw panel.
        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the DataPlace
        b - True to set as end place; otherwise false

      • setGuiEndPlaceCandidate

        void setGuiEndPlaceCandidate(java.lang.String placeId,
                             boolean b)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the end place candidate on the draw panel.
        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the DataPlace
        b - True to set as end place candidate; otherwise false

      • highlightUnreachableGuiNode

        void highlightUnreachableGuiNode(java.lang.String nodeId,
                                 boolean b)
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the status of the specified GUI node on the draw panel.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The id of the IDataNode
        b - True = unreachable; False = can be reached from the start place and can reach the end place

      • addOverlay

        void addOverlay(IOverlay overlay,
                EOverlayName name)
        Adds the specified IOverlay (for paintable elements) to this GUI model.
        Parameters:
        overlay - The IOverlay to add
        name - The EOverlayName for the specified overlay

      • removeOverlay

        void removeOverlay(EOverlayName name)
        Removes the specified overlay from this GUI model.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the IOverlay to remove

      • getAllOverlays

        java.util.List<IOverlay> getAllOverlays()
        Returns a list with all overlays on this IGuiModel.

        Note: This should be used by the IDrawPanel to retrieve all overlays that may contain paintable elements.
        Returns:
        List of type IOverlay

      • getOverlayByName

        IOverlay getOverlayByName(EOverlayName name)
        Returns the specified overlay from this IGuiModels overlays.
        Parameters:
        name - The EOverlayName of the overlay
        Returns:
        The specified IOverlay

      • deactivated

        void deactivated()
        To be called for cleanup of an IGuiModel after it got deactivated.

        Currently used to remove overlays.

      • getStartPlaceArea

        java.awt.Rectangle getStartPlaceArea()
        Returns the area of the start place in this IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        A Rectangle; null if this IGuiModel has no real (unambiguous) start place

      • getEnabledTransitionsAreas

        java.util.List<java.awt.Rectangle> getEnabledTransitionsAreas()
        Returns a List with the areas of all enabled IGuiTransition in this IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        A List of type Rectangle; empty List if this IGuiModel has no enabled IGuiTransition
